dc:title: Day After Day - June 1936
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Life at the farm in Easton, Pennsylvania, described in detail--toil, joys, care of animals. While planting onions she reflects on the plight of migrant workers.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 301 1936-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
